data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Rhyne, Andrew L., Calado, Ricardo, Santos, Antonina Dos (2012): Lysmata jundalini, a new peppermint shrimp (Decapoda, Caridea, Hippolytidae) from the Western Atlantic. Zootaxa 3579: 71-79, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.213670
